title: RioBlemz
author: RioBlemz
content: My Elders, uncle, brothers and sister I greet oh. I no sabi too much and this period i come dey think in the midst of wetin dey happen for Naija wetin I go learn from Tinubu. No vex, I know say somebody fit learn from bad and good. I don put few observation I make below i go like make una advice me and talk una own opinion as concern this topic.Influnce- Tinubu get too much influence. I fit develop imy influence to a reasonable level wey my influence go dey work for me.Craftiness- Tinubu have ability to turn and underturn tables before you realize. Is craftiness a tool I need to get for Naija?Money- Jagaban hold money them dey call am Bullion Van but Me I no know how e get the money.Inconsistent Data Record- So many contradiction on date of birth, age, family history etc. Me I go say e good make person get straight data record.Jagaban get boys for street i.e Men mount oooh. E good make person get that kind structure.This na few things. Abeg make you put mounth

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.created_time: October 06, 2023, 09:47:25 AMLast edit: October 06, 2023, 05:53:26 PM by DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: Quote from: RioBlemz on October 06, 2023, 07:21:03 AMInflunce- Tinubu get too much influence. I fit develop imy influence to a reasonable level wey my influence go dey work for me.I agree with you, and after  more than four months in office, things are worse than it was before he entered which proves his influence is destructive. Destructive influence is a threat to humanityQuoteCraftiness- Tinubu have ability to turn and underturn tables before you realize. Is craftiness a tool I need to get for Naija?You can be crafty yes, but in all, let people benefit from your craftiness. Cos when the reverse is the case, it becomes a total waste of talent. Imagine how good Nigeria would've been if his craftiness as you said was used efficiently. Abeg no learn that type of craftiness.QuoteMoney- Jagaban hold money them dey call am Bullion Van but Me I no know how e get the money.Me and you know very well how he got his money. Its all over the news and judging from his jail terms served, the reasons he went to jail, forfeited properties and number of countries he's banned from entering. You're totally dishonest here.QuoteInconsistent Data Record-[/b] So many contradiction on date of birth, age, family history etc. Me I go say e good make person get straight data recordThis point is very contradictory, your outlining things you're learning from him and you're still contradicting yourself?. I don't think you thought over this very well before posting.QuoteThis na few things. Abeg make you put mounthI just get one thing to say to you, check the morality standard and implication of the posts you drop here. No dey increase our vex level with all these mumu posts.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: RioBlemz on October 06, 2023, 07:21:03 AMMy Elders, uncle, brothers and sister I greet oh. I no sabi too much and this period i come dey think in the midst of wetin dey happen for Naija wetin I go learn from Tinubu. No vex, I know say somebody fit learn from bad and good. I don put few observation I make below i go like make una advice me and talk una own opinion as concern this topic.Influnce- Tinubu get too much influence. I fit develop imy influence to a reasonable level wey my influence go dey work for me.Craftiness- Tinubu have ability to turn and underturn tables before you realize. Is craftiness a tool I need to get for Naija?Money- Jagaban hold money them dey call am Bullion Van but Me I no know how e get the money.Inconsistent Data Record- So many contradiction on date of birth, age, family history etc. Me I go say e good make person get straight data record.Jagaban get boys for street i.e Men mount oooh. E good make person get that kind structure.This na few things. Abeg make you put mounthBy the time they succeed in institutionalizing rascality in all agencies of government, then you will realise we are sinking as a nation. E still dey sweet now for those wey support the rulling party because "first to do no dey pain". Who in Nigeria will believe that PDP will relinquish power to another party? They had everything and were so arrogant. Today, they are history and some of those people in PDP that felt too big are in prison or have gone to prison or detention. At the moment, we are at the lowest level as a country in terms of moralty, freedom, progress and what have you. So I don't have anything to learn from people who are desperate to force themselves on the people.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: E get one tin I don find out and still dey observe for inside this Nigeria, we don normalize wrong tins to the extend e don turn to norms for we society. That wen person dey do sumtin wey dey very untinkable and against natural justice still people go de clap hands for am becos of small small coins wey de drop into their pockets from that individual.In my opinion all these tins about tinkin that there's anything good to learn from this rogues of politicians we get nah dey give Dem mind to de still wetin supos belong to everybodi blivin say notin go happen cos men mount. For me oh, there's nothin gud to learn from evil and unacceptable behaviours of taking what belong to the crowd and personalizing it to your private properties while the crowd keeps suffering.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Absolutely nothing good to learn from tinibu. except bad things.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: RioBlemz on October 06, 2023, 07:21:03 AMMy Elders, uncle, brothers and sister I greet oh. I no sabi too much and this period i come dey think in the midst of wetin dey happen for Naija wetin I go learn from Tinubu. No vex, I know say somebody fit learn from bad and good. I don put few observation I make below i go like make una advice me and talk una own opinion as concern this topic.You no suppose they learn the bad things or even list am, as na only good things are worth learning. Tinubu is a dirty man and anybody wey get sense go know that one but unlike others, the man use his own dirty money well na just say as him wan collect presidential power, him over do him own if not many people no for hate am the way dey hate am now and if this injustice was done to others like him (Atiku) we for overlook am but as him do am to a man of the power (Obi) na why everybody dey para.  Tinubu has some good character that can be learnt from like his Boldness, charisma and determination to win against all odds, the money wey him get just amplifier everything bothe the good and the bad. Quote from: Samlucky O on October 06, 2023, 01:28:33 PMAbsolutely nothing good to learn from tinibu. except bad things.No, even satan get sometimes to learn from, one good thing to learn form tinubu na the investment in people and when your turn come people wey you invest inside go repay you the favor. While others dey invest in things wey go only benefit dem, tinubu was investing in humans. He gave many man and woman political positions wey dun help them stand on their feet today. As wike help tinubu win rivers state for last election, I hear say when wike been dey do rerun, na tinubu help am defeat amaechi for rivers state as Amaechi been dun already they use federal power collect power from him hand. Weda we like Nigeria politics or not, the way e dey so if you wan enter politic and succeed, no forget to invest in humans and even carry this mentality go into other businesses and you go succeed.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.created_time: October 06, 2023, 03:47:08 PMLast edit: October 06, 2023, 03:57:17 PM by Sim_card
comments.body: It is better to learn something good so that you can improve your life, than to learn something bad that will destroy your life. Jagaban can not be someone that I admire his lifestyle and his wealth because his hands are dirty and that is why you see that Nigeria is not moving forward because most people that sits on power maneuver their way to the top through so many devilish act and what do you except from them, only pains and sufferings that they will put on the citizens because them no like to see people dey get joy. Quote from: CryptopreneurBrainboss on October 06, 2023, 02:09:41 PMone good thing to learn form tinubu na the investment in people and when your turn come people wey you invest inside go repay you the favor. While others dey invest in things wey go only benefit dem, tinubu was investing in humansMy biggest Boss, you dey right but wetin I observe say this lifestyle of help me, I help you, na so politics dey because them no say only them no go fit do am on their own as them needs support from other politicians to help them achieve their goal. If I help you today when I dey power or I fit help you base on who my position, make you know say that person no do am for free but someday he go come back to ask you to help am. And na all these things dey kill our economy and the country. Na him we dey call Nepotism, because if I help you today, tomorrow when you dey power if I come meet you, you go also help me na wetin come turn Nigeria to paddy paddy government. This thing go make whoever no dey their cacus no go fit win election. Na only people wey feel say them get everything and no go need anybody help to survive no dey help person but politicians no dey like that because them believe in tomorrow.

comments.author: AYOBA
comments.body: Quote from: RioBlemz on October 06, 2023, 07:21:03 AMMy Elders, uncle, brothers and sister I greet oh. I no sabi too much and this period i come dey think in the midst of wetin dey happen for Naija wetin I go learn from Tinubu. No vex, I know say somebody fit learn from bad and good. I don put few observation I make below i go like make una advice me and talk una own opinion as concern this topic.In my opinion I don't see waiting we go lean from this jagaban accept bad things because e don turn out country to stress country. Since from the first month that this man Start his tenure seriously Nigeria didn't move properly again we all understand that during baba Buhari regime things also hard but this jagaban is worsted, especially we poor how them wan make we survived?

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: CryptopreneurBrainboss on October 06, 2023, 02:09:41 PMQuote from: RioBlemz on October 06, 2023, 07:21:03 AMMy Elders, uncle, brothers and sister I greet oh. I no sabi too much and this period i come dey think in the midst of wetin dey happen for Naija wetin I go learn from Tinubu. No vex, I know say somebody fit learn from bad and good. I don put few observation I make below i go like make una advice me and talk una own opinion as concern this topic.You no suppose they learn the bad things or even list am, as na only good things are worth learning. Tinubu is a dirty man and anybody wey get sense go know that one but unlike others, the man use his own dirty money well na just say as him wan collect presidential power, him over do him own if not many people no for hate am the way dey hate am now and if this injustice was done to others like him (Atiku) we for overlook am but as him do am to a man of the power (Obi) na why everybody dey para.  Tinubu has some good character that can be learnt from like his Boldness, charisma and determination to win against all odds, the money wey him get just amplifier everything bothe the good and the bad. Quote from: Samlucky O on October 06, 2023, 01:28:33 PMAbsolutely nothing good to learn from tinibu. except bad things.No, even satan get sometimes to learn from, one good thing to learn form tinubu na the investment in people and when your turn come people wey you invest inside go repay you the favor. While others dey invest in things wey go only benefit dem, tinubu was investing in humans. He gave many man and woman political positions wey dun help them stand on their feet today. As wike help tinubu win rivers state for last election, I hear say when wike been dey do rerun, na tinubu help am defeat amaechi for rivers state as Amaechi been dun already they use federal power collect power from him hand. Weda we like Nigeria politics or not, the way e dey so if you wan enter politic and succeed, no forget to invest in humans and even carry this mentality go into other businesses and you go succeed. It's true. There is no body that is perfectly. Your enermy is another person best friend. What favoured me might not favour you. And every good person has also a bad side and one should not only concentrate on the bad aspect because of how you fell about the person. I have also learn something today, that's why dey said learning never end. Thanks#cryptoprebrainboss.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Quote from: Sim_card on October 06, 2023, 03:47:08 PMIt is better to learn something good so that you can improve your life, than to learn something bad that will destroy your life. Jagaban can not be someone that I admire his lifestyle and his wealth because his hands are dirty and that is why you see that Nigeria is not moving forward because most people that sits on power maneuver their way to the top through so many devilish act and what do you except from them, only pains and sufferings that they will put on the citizens because them no like to see people dey get joy.@sim_card, I have to disagree with you on this, yes if is true to learn something good from somebody so that we can add it up to our own knowledge and improve but when you say there is nothing that you admire from our presido jagaban, those it means that as a person he is, there is nothing good in him? If you think that yes is the answer to the question that means you are absolutely wrong.As a human being, we can not be completely good among our self's, there are places we do wrong and sometimes do right, so what I am saying is that our presido is not completely a bad person.Although, jagaban hasn't done anything good that I have seen, but I have sat down to think that what if what he's doing might be of help tomorrow, besides when Peter obi dey for seat as governor people been no know em value untill e comot.

comments.author: Onyeeze
comments.body: Wetin the thing wey this your post dey teach, if you read this post like three times you will know that is not teaching any Nigerian who is here anything, its good for you to understand some certain things concerning what is happening in a government before you create topic, if you want to discuss nigeria politics you can move ahead to bring good topic to discuss of nigeria government and forget criticism  because reading this post twenty times nothing meaningful is the topic teaching us.

comments.author: RioBlemz
comments.body: Quote from: Onyeeze on October 07, 2023, 06:57:36 PMWetin the thing wey this your post dey teach, if you read this post like three times you will know that is not teaching any Nigerian who is here anything, its good for you to understand some certain things concerning what is happening in a government before you create topic, if you want to discuss nigeria politics you can move ahead to bring good topic to discuss of nigeria government and forget criticism  because reading this post twenty times nothing meaningful is the topic teaching us.Listen, remove bias, emotions and prejudice for everything happening you have something to learn. As I said you can either learn from the bad or the good or you can learn to replicate the bad things the person stands for in a good way. For instance you can observe an elderly person that wasted his or her life and decide not to make same mistake.One major lesson I learnt in this season is that I have seen how evil people or corrupt politician rally around themselves for support and even arm twisting the law for their gain. The question is how many times have I rally around a good person for support or how often do good people come together to stand and defend their own or push their own agenda.

E good make person get that kind structure.This na few things. Abeg make you put mounthGuy na 8 years we go face all this wahala for Naija hope u know, like this i no know the mouth i wan put for the matter because if i seat down dey reason, how my growing up as a child been dey like i just dey feel for this generation honestly ITS HEART BREAKING

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: Quote from: RioBlemz on October 06, 2023, 07:21:03 AMMy Elders, uncle, brothers and sister I greet oh. I no sabi too much and this period i come dey think in the midst of wetin dey happen for Naija wetin I go learn from Tinubu. No vex, I know say somebody fit learn from bad and good. I don put few observation I make below i go like make una advice me and talk una own opinion as concern this topic.Influnce- Tinubu get too much influence. I fit develop imy influence to a reasonable level wey my influence go dey work for me.Craftiness- Tinubu have ability to turn and underturn tables before you realize. Is craftiness a tool I need to get for Naija?Money- Jagaban hold money them dey call am Bullion Van but Me I no know how e get the money.Inconsistent Data Record- So many contradiction on date of birth, age, family history etc. Me I go say e good make person get straight data record.Jagaban get boys for street i.e Men mount oooh. E good make person get that kind structure.This na few things. Abeg make you put mounthPeople like jagaban, will always succeed in a place like Nigeria na. Don't you see how exposed he was in U.S when he was doing those alleged drug business. If we continue to as a people to have a structure of people like Jagaban and Buhari, just forget about things coming to normalcy in Nigeria.  The influence your talking about, is not influence of Ideas and technical know-how to improve the lots of Nigerians, but that of hunger, as he seems like their source of income. In today's world, Idea rules the world, I don't see Jagaban possessing any ideas or what so ever to turn around things.
